S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-438 (partial) Ensure internal conversions of JDBC objects to BLOBs provide the conversion using RawToBinaryFormatStream from the raw binary stream to the on-disk format stream as required by the data type api. Make RawToBinaryFormatStream encode the length of the value in the first bytes as defined in the format described in SQLBinary. Ensure the code handles this encoded lenght correctly.
